Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is tend to provide the whole process and results of the questions that I've put in, while my teacher prefer to give me some tips and cues to lead me to do the answers on my own.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI provide various aspects of the questions, while teachers tend to provide the results that regarding to what I am studying(finance) and give some example of it.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: The measure that I get feedback from the two is different. I got results immediately from my phone if I use GenAI. It spends me more time going to the office or consultation for the feedback from teachers.
